messages: 1d3bfcfde5ac540a616a25dff751e36f (14:20): surkov: mind if i send note about your suggested algorithm documentation style to html mailing list for feedback?
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (14:21): 1d3bfcfde5ac540a616a25dff751e36f: I don't mind
1d3bfcfde5ac540a616a25dff751e36f (14:21): thanks
3fe145094f808469bffe4e30453f94c1 (14:34): surkov: Any chance the aria-activedescendant changes could regress the Yahoo! Mail messages list? I'm not sure whether this uses ARIA roles or not.
1d3bfcfde5ac540a616a25dff751e36f (14:38): surkov: sent and ccd you
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (14:41): 1d3bfcfde5ac540a616a25dff751e36f: thanks!
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (14:42): MarcoZ: any ARIA related change can regress some product. Do you try build?
1d3bfcfde5ac540a616a25dff751e36f (14:42): surkov: btw are you a member of the html wg? if not would be great to have your input!
3fe145094f808469bffe4e30453f94c1 (14:43): surkov: Yes I'd like a try build if possible, thanks!
1d3bfcfde5ac540a616a25dff751e36f (14:44): surkov: you don't have to commit any time, just chime in whenever you feel like it
3fe145094f808469bffe4e30453f94c1 (14:44): surkov: The changes look OK to me in principle, but I am wondering whether this is too aggressive a change maybe.
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (14:44): 1d3bfcfde5ac540a616a25dff751e36f: I think I don't,  but actually I'm confused about what membership means.
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (14:45): MarcoZ: could you say which bug do you need it for? :)
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (14:45): 1d3bfcfde5ac540a616a25dff751e36f: how can I do that?
47e87577fff6e08b0f2f43540db8c9c9 (14:45): Bug https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=706079 nor, --, ---, surkov.alexander, ASSI, ignore aria-activedescendant referent having no ARIA role
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (14:46): MarcoZ: Ok, I will do.
3fe145094f808469bffe4e30453f94c1 (14:46): surkov: Thanks you!
1d3bfcfde5ac540a616a25dff751e36f (14:46): surkov: all it means is you subscibed to the mailing list and get to vote on decisions
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (14:47): 1d3bfcfde5ac540a616a25dff751e36f: ok, I'll check if I'm subscribed
1d3bfcfde5ac540a616a25dff751e36f (14:48): surkov: you will probably need to contact your w3c AC rep (david baron) to join the group
1d3bfcfde5ac540a616a25dff751e36f (14:48): surkov: ask dbolter, he must be good for something :-)
1d3bfcfde5ac540a616a25dff751e36f (15:06): davidb: morning!
906cca2a5ed603c0f4e8b08b56a80768 (15:07): hi 1d3bfcfde5ac540a616a25dff751e36f!

1d3bfcfde5ac540a616a25dff751e36f (15:07): davidb: am encouraging surkov to join the HTML WG ;-)

3fe145094f808469bffe4e30453f94c1 (15:12): Morning davidb!
906cca2a5ed603c0f4e8b08b56a80768 (15:12): Hi MarcoZ!
906cca2a5ed603c0f4e8b08b56a80768 (15:13): is on the phone

906cca2a5ed603c0f4e8b08b56a80768 (15:19): (or membership_
